scripts.start:playground: npm run copy-readme && ng serve playground
scripts.build:playground: npm run copy-readme && ng build playground
scripts.build-publish: npm run build:quang && cd dist/quang && npm publish
scripts.build-publish:prerelease: npm run build:quang && cd dist/quang && npm publish --tag prerelease
scripts.sync-version: jq '.version = "'$npm_package_version'"' projects/quang/package.json > temp.json && mv temp.json projects/quang/package.json
scripts.publish:prerelease: npm version prerelease -m "build(prerelease): version %s" && npm run build-publish:prerelease
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch -m "build(patch): version %s" && npm run build-publish && npm run deploy:git
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor -m "build(minor): version %s" && npm run build-publish && npm run deploy:git
scripts.publish:major: npm version major -m "build(major): version %s" && npm run build-publish && npm run deploy:git
scripts.lint-and-format: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.deploy:git: npm run copy-readme && ng deploy playground --base-href=/quix-quang/
